prizeListMission1:
WildCard Missions are rapid, quick-fire missions not listed in the normal schedule.

They are over almost as fast as they have begun, so you better be quick and a little bit lucky!

Good luck, Crime Fighter!
emailMission1:
The Viper has been spotted by Trafalgar Square. He is on to us, so you have only a few minutes. Go capture him before he escapes.

Good luck, Crime Fighter. All of London is depending on you...
revealcluesMission1: LIVE WILDCARD LIVE WILDCARD LIVE WILDCARD

intro:
This is your first WILD clue, Crime Fighter.

Good luck finding the Viper. The whole of London is depending on you!
